DeleteReassignDescription: All personal files and folders in My documents section of this user will be permanently deleted. Rooms created by this user and documents stored in these rooms will be reassigned automatically to an admin performing the deletion: {{userPerformedDeletion}} ({{userYou}}). Reassign data manually to choose another destination user for reassignment.
DeleteUserMessage: {{userCaption}} {{user}} will be deleted. User personal documents which are available to others will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
SuccessfullyDeleteUserInfoMessage: The user has been successfully deleted
